attributes.title: take it DOWN .
attributes.review: Is this really want y’all for America?? Just think of all the crap that he put us through and y’all support that ??? . This system is already as messed up as it is, so please stop all the support for this man it makes no sense AT ALL . He’s done nothing but destroy lives and tan. Let’s show this conceited fruit who really has the say so .

attributes.title: worst app in the world!! do NOT get it!!
attributes.review: it is so bad that it makes me wanna throw up. getting the app was by far the absolute WORST decision i’ve ever made. and why would our president have to make a whole APP and hold RALLIES instead of running our country?? make it make sense.

attributes.title: I waz hacked !!!!!
attributes.review: It’s such a bad app. Really y’all don’t get it. I opened it and it hacked me. This was a very bad app. It put me through a very bad experience. Horrible! I also got orange Cheeto stains on my fingers every time I typed. 🤔

attributes.title: Sorry but no sis 😊
attributes.review: This app is not helpful and Donald trump needs to be put out. I’m ready for a change for the better. Let us rise up and take over. I had no use for this app it is literal garbage. So this app needs to be taken off. Also there are inappropriate things in the app.

attributes.title: F
attributes.review: The app is terrible. I downloaded it and it made my phone slow it also kept kicking my out of the app and it was simply so hard to use.

attributes.title: One only star on the sky!
attributes.review: Trump is number one, so I put only star for him is the most respectful thing to do. About the app, I don’t need to review. Other people wrote it already. 😂
